item.title: About
item.description: “PM” is a special acronym for me. The letter P reflects three main areas of experience for me: Product, Project, and Process. The letter M stands for Manager, which is my main profession. My name is Slava, and I can: create products, manage projects, analyze processes, and provide trainings. In all these four areas, I have results that I am not ashamed of. You can find examples of my work on the Projects page of my website.
